item.description:
The movie I originally scheduled for this time slot got a delayed release, but this one looks interesting...plagiarism...tsk tsk....nothing good can come out of that!

Showtime is at 7:30.  I will be at the theater by 6:30 and we will head in for seats by 7.

The movie is showing upstairs so look for the group at the tables at the top of the escalator.    I will be wearing my oh so stylin' meetup pin.

As I like to see these movies during opening weekend, it is usually a good idea to buy your tickets ahead of time....especially if it is a big movie with lots of buzz.

If you miss the group ahead of time, come find us after. We gather in the hallway outside of the theater we just saw the movie in, to discuss the film a bit, allow for restroom breaks and to get a head count of all those who would like to go out after for drinks and munchies.

$$$$Managing the after event is much easier if everyone brings cash, so please plan ahead if you want to go out with the group after.$$$$$

Movie Details:

Release Date: September 7, 2012
Studio: CBS Films
Director:Brian Klugman, Lee Sternthal
Screenwriter:Brian Klugman, Lee Sternthal
Starring: Bradley Cooper, Jeremy Irons, Dennis Quaid, Olivia Wilde, Zoe Saldana
Genre: Drama, Romance
MPAA Rating: PG-13 (for brief strong language and smoking)
Official Website: TheWordsmovie.com | Facebook | Twitter
Review: 8/10 rating
DVD Review: Not Available
DVD: Not Available
Movie Poster: View here
Production Stills: View here

Plot Summary: Starring Bradley Cooper, Oscar®-winner Jeremy Irons, Dennis Quaid, Olivia Wilde and Zoë Saldana, the layered romantic drama "The Words" follows young writer Rory Jansen who finally achieves long sought after literary success after publishing the next great American novel. There's only one catch - he didn't write it. As the past comes back to haunt him and his literary star continues to rise, Jansen is forced to confront the steep price that must be paid for stealing another man's work, and for placing ambition and success above life's most fundamental three words.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: The Words
